Reviews.Title: Great Camera..beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: Terrie L. Ruchty
Reviews.Content: this camera is incredible..the  underwater videos are clear and the colors beautiful.Its easy to use. LOVE IT...wish I would have gotten one sooner!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: kimimarie95
Reviews.Content: This product is absolutely wonderful! It works great above water and under water. The picture is very bright and clear. I recommend this camera if you want great pictures anywhere you are. The only bad thing about this product is that it does not have a lense cover.

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP CMOS Sensor produces high resolution movies and photoes, perfect for enlarged prints
5x Fujinon Optical Zoom allows you to get closer to the subject everytime
2.7 Inch High Resolution 230,000 dot LCD Screen makes composing and viewing images a pleasure
Waterproof,Shook Proof, Dust Proof and Freeze Proof perfect for extreme sports and rugged activities
CMOS Shift Image Stabilisation ensures crisp shake free photos everytime
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix XP50 XP51 Blue Digital Camera Blue
